notes: Fixed a critical defect where the 'Save Changes' button in the Edit Event modal was not functional due to a missing form element.
Resolved console errors related to the checklist feature on the Edit Event modal.
Corrected the Raceday Countdown logic to ensure it updates properly after adding a new raceday event.
Replaced the 'no raceday' icon with a more intuitive '+ Add Race' text link to improve user experience.
Resolved a 500 Internal Server Error caused by the Raceday Countdown when a user had events, but none were marked as a Raceday.
